title: Translate App
description: As a Frontend developer, you will be given tasks to build interactive application . In this challenge, you will build an simple translate application with given API.

userStories.content: Create a translate application page that matches the given design.
By default, it should translate 'Hello, how are you' to French.
Users can change translating text with maxium of 500 characters.
Users can see the translated text after selected Translate button. Optionally, users can see updates in real time and you use debounce or throttling to optimize the application.
Users can choose different languages to translate from. They should see at least 3 options: Detect Language, English and French.
Users can switch translation language and translated language.
Users can have option to listen the translating and translated texts.
Users can copy the translating and translated texts.
